SOS: YOUR FUND RAISING PLATFORM

We've combined all the tools to make public offerings easy for issuers, brokers, startups and existing companies.

We've simplified the process by integrating a platform that combines marketing, distribution of PPM, settlement of funds, along with either our stand alone transfer agent software or one of our SEC registered transfer agents.

Simple

Use our solutions as you need them. No commitment.

Regulated

SEC Regulated

Secure

Stand alone VM? Yes. Encrypted? We got it. OCI-DS? Checked.
